title: Springfield, Missouri
summary: Springfield is the third largest city in the state of Missouri and the county seat of Greene County.[4] As of the 2020 census, the city's population was 169,176.[5] As of 2019, the Census Bureau estimated its population at 167,882. It is the principal city of the Springfield metropolitan area, which has a population of 462,369 and includes the counties of Christian, Dallas, Greene, Polk, and Webster.[6]
